UPDATE - 5/8/18 - We're back up and running. Thanks for the patience of those who reached out with questions and for those who helped me with the recovery.

UPDATE - 10/5/19 - I had this closed for a few hours as I brought in some chapters from an old, outdated interactive that is being removed. Hope you enjoy!

The ass focused shrink interactives aren't exactly uncommon. However, a lot of them go down different paths than what I would like to see. There was one amazing interactive that has since been deactivated and this is my attempt at recreating what that had.

You are an 18 year old recent high school graduate. That is about the only thing that is set from Chapter 1. The first chapter will lead you down a variety of path options that will set the rest of the story in motion. You will shrink in a location based on the option you select. You are surrounded by beautiful women with great bodies, with an emphasis on their ass. For the most part, these should be women you did not know prior to shrinking but that is not a hard and fast rule.

Rules:

10. This was originally a private story so that I could build up a few chapters. But now I opened it up and welcome your additions!

That's it! I hope you enjoy it. I reserve the right to add or remove rules at any time.
